comment._content: Probably the wife of Henry Huttleston Rogers, Jr. Here is senior: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Huttleston_Rogers

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Harry H. Rogers Jr.'s first wife was Mary Benjamin Rogers (they married in 1907, had two children, Harry III and Millicent, and divorced in 1929): neprhauntedhistory.weebly.com/henry-h-rogers.html There's another photo of Mary Benjamin Rogers at this site: www.newyorksocialdiary.com/node/1907059 She was a close friend of Mark Twain's in his later years: www.twainquotes.com/19610426.html books.google.com/books/about/Mark_Twain_s_letters_to_Mary...
